elements.name: diagram_data
elements.documentation: Represents a all the data associated with a diagram.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.documentation: All attributes associated with the diagram data.

elements.name: attribute
elements.documentation: Attribute in a Dia diagram.

elements.name: composite
elements.documentation: Attribute value which is made up of other attributes.

attributes.name: inner_composite
attributes.documentation: Some composites contain an inner composite field.

elements.name: color
elements.documentation: Represents a color in a diagram.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of an RGB value in hex.

elements.name: diagram
elements.documentation: Represents a diagram in Dia.

elements.name: layer
elements.documentation: Represents a layer in a Dia diagram.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.documentation: Whether the layer is visible on screen or not.

attributes.name: active
attributes.documentation: Whether the layer is active or not.

elements.name: real
elements.documentation: Represents a real value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of a real value.

elements.name: integer
elements.documentation: Represents an integer value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of an integer value.

elements.name: object
elements.documentation: Represents a Dia object.

attributes.name: id
attributes.documentation: Unique identifier for the object in this diagram.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.documentation: All attributes associated with the object.

elements.name: point
elements.documentation: Represents a point in a diagram.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of a point with X/Y coordinates.

elements.name: boolean
elements.documentation: Represents a boolean value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of a boolean value.

elements.name: child_node
elements.documentation:
Represents a child_node in a diagram.

Child nodes are used in Dia to represent the relationship between a
package and the entities it contains. For example, if class O1 is
inside package O0 then class O1 will have a child node element with
a parent pointing to O0.

elements.name: string
elements.documentation: Represents a string value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of a string value.

elements.name: font
elements.documentation: Represents a font in a diagram.

elements.name: enumeration
elements.documentation: Represents a enumeration in a diagram.

elements.name: connection
elements.documentation: Connection between entities in a Dia diagram.

attributes.name: connection_slot
attributes.documentation:
Number of the connection slot we're connected to.

This is known in Dia as a connection but to avoid confusion
between the class and the slot concepts, we renamed it.

elements.name: rectangle
elements.documentation: Represents a rectangle in a diagram.

attributes.name: value
attributes.documentation: Text representation of a rectangle with a pair of X/Y coordinates.

elements.name: hydrator
elements.documentation: Reads a Dia diagram and instatiates the dia model objects.

elements.name: hydration_error
elements.documentation: An error occurred while reading a diagram.

elements.name: persister_error
elements.documentation: An error occurred whilst tryng to persist a Dia diagram.
